person.persName: Isaac Calhoon (McLean co. State Rep & Maj. 17th KY Inf)

body.p: Calhoun, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Calhoon and Mary Calhoon. Laborer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Calhoun in 1860. Major of the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from December 31, 1861 to June 11, 1862. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from McLean County, Kentucky, from 1863 to 1867.
